name: BQ24298
keywords: Battery, BQ24298, Charge, buck, boost, power, management, PMIC, akkoyun, li-Ion
description: The bq24298 is a highly-integrated switch-mode battery charge management and system power path management device for 1 cell Li-Ion and Li-polymer battery in a wide range of smart phone and tablet applications. Its low impedance power path optimizes switch-mode operation efficiency, reduces battery charging time and extends battery life during discharging phase.
